schemaMeta.comments: Extension to the LADM used by SOLA to implement Bulk Operation functionality such as loading of shapefiles and documents.

table.name: Function: clean_after_rollback
table.comments: Runs clean up tasks after the transaction of bulk operation is rolled back.

table.name: Function: move_cadastre_objects
table.comments: Moves cadastre objects from the Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema.

table.name: Function: move_other_objects
table.comments: Moves general spatial objects other than cadastre objects from the Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema. If an appropriate level and/or structure type do not exist in the Cadastre schema, this function will add them.

table.name: Function: move_spatial_units
table.comments: Moves all spatial data from teh Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema using the move_cadastre_objects and move_other_objects functions. This function is called after the bulk opearation transaction is created by the Bulk Operation application.
